attributes.additional_details:
British workers / tax payers  are paying far too much money out for non-British and non contributing people
living in this country.
I would suggest that workers who are from within the European market and out of work or claiming benefits.
That our government should have the right and the entitlement to claw back any benefit claims or housing
costs from the country the said person is from.

More Importantly if any workers who are from within the European market need the use or facility to
our NHS. Any medical costs should be recovered by a compulsory medical insurance or medical costs able
to be clawed back from the country the said person is from. ( Captain Common Sense )
